description: The past retains its fascinating appeal in this traditional restaurant situated in a small mountain village, where modern trends are ignored in favour of authentic dishes from the South Tyrol. Originally opened as an inn, the restaurant still offers a few simple and discreet rooms furnished in traditional style, as well as a new and modern sauna.
creditCards: ['Credit card / Debit card accepted', ' Mastercard credit card', ' Visa credit card']
